problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB,垂足为E,如果AB=20,CD=16,那么线段OE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, the chord CD ⊥ AB, the vertical foot is E, if AB = N_0, CD = N_1, then the length of the line segment OE is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:如图所示,连接OD．∵弦CD⊥AB,AB为圆O的直径,∴E为CD的中点,又∵CD=16,∴CE=DE=\frac{1}{2}CD=8,又∵OD=\frac{1}{2}AB=10,∵CD⊥AB,∴∠OED=90°,在Rt△ODE中,DE=8,OD=10,根据勾股定理得:OE²+DE²=OD²,∴OE=√{OD²-DE²}=6,则OE的长度为6,
